mapper.select:
SELECT stat_consume_time_distribution.log_day log_day, stat_consume_time_distribution.pid pid, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_1 s_1, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_2 s_2, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_3 s_3, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_4 s_4, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_5 s_5, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_6 s_6, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_7 s_7, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_8 s_8, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_9 s_9, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_10 s_10, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_11 s_11, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_12 s_12, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_13 s_13, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_14 s_14, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_15 s_15, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_16 s_16, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_17 s_17, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_18 s_18, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_19 s_19, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_20 s_20, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_21 s_21, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_22 s_22, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_23 s_23, stat_consume_time_distribution.section_24 s_24 FROM stat_consume_time_distribution WHERE 1 = 1
AND pid IN
#{item}
and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') ORDER BY stat_consume_time_distribution.log_day DESC

SELECT log_day, pid, section_1 s_1, section_2 s_2, section_3 s_3, section_4 s_4, section_5 s_5, section_6 s_6, section_7 s_7, section_8 s_8, section_9 s_9, section_10 s_10, section_11 s_11, section_12 s_12, section_13 s_13, section_14 s_14, section_15 s_15, section_16 s_16, section_17 s_17, section_18 s_18, section_19 s_19, section_20 s_20, section_21 s_21, section_22 s_22, section_23 s_23, section_24 s_24 FROM stat_consume_banding_time_distribution WHERE 1 = 1
AND pid IN
#{item}
and log_day <= replace(#{createDateEnd},'-','') and log_day >= replace(#{createDateStart},'-','') ORDER BY log_day DESC
